currentPage.description: Gets or sets the current page.

pageCount.description: Gets or sets the page count.

pageSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the page.

rowCount.description: Gets or sets the row count.

allOf.description: Represents the request to create a User.

connection.description: Gets or sets the connection the user belongs to.

user_id.description: Gets or sets the (optional) id of the user

password.description: Gets or sets the user's password. This is mandatory only for auth0 connection strategy.

verify_email.description: Gets or sets whether the user's email change must be verified. True if it must be verified, otherwise false.

UserBase.description: Contains common elements used for both constructing User-related requests, and comprising User-related responses.

app_metadata.description: Contains user meta data. The user has read-only access to this.

email.description: Gets or sets the user's email address.

email_verified.description: Gets or sets whether the user's email address is verified.

phone_number.description: Gets or sets the user's phone number.

phone_verified.description: Gets or sets whether the user's phone is verified.

user_metadata.description: Contains user meta data. The user has read/write access to this.

username.description: Gets or sets the user' username.

given_name.description: The first name of the user (if available).

name.description: The full name of the user (e.g.: John Foo). ALWAYS GENERATED.

family_name.description: The last name of the user (if available).

picture.description: URL pointing to the user picture (if not available, will use gravatar.com with the email). ALWAYS GENERATED

blocked.description: Gets or sets whether the user is blocked. True if the user is blocked, otherwise false.

allOf.description: Represents a request to sign up a new user.

username.description: Username of this user. Only valid if the connection requires a username.

picture.description: URL to a picture of this user.

user_metadata.description: Metadata the user has read/write access to.

UserMaintenanceRequestBase.description: Base class for user maintenance requests.

PaginationInfo.description: Specifies pagination info to use when requesting paged results.

includeTotals.description: Return results with a total result count (true) or with no totals (false, default).

pageNo.description: Page index of the results to return. First page is 0.

AssignPermissionsRequest.description: Contains details of permissions that should be assigned to a role.

permissions.description: User IDs to assign to the role.

PermissionIdentity.description: Represents the properties of a permission that give it its unique identity.

resource_server_identifier.description: The resource server that the permission is attached to.

AssignRolesRequest.description: Contains details of roles that should be assigned to a user.

roles.description: Role IDs to assign to the user.
